CHAT.comment: child first teaches the mother to make a small figure jump up and down 3 times and sit on a minature bench. Live rock band is practicing in the next room. The participants seem to ignore this reasonably well , particularly the mother and child. It did make transcribing a bit difficult.

CHAT.comment: The child now teaches the mother to make a small figure run around a big figure , jump over the little figure , and sit on a bench. Rock band continues to play in the next room.
the child teaches the mother to string beads , first a square one and then a round one. Band continues to play in the background.

u.a: long period of silence as C strings a bead .
another long period of silence as the child strings the second bead .
utterance follows a long pause when Brian and his 2 year old sister work quietly on stringing beads .
